title: Protecting Project Pulp
description: Protecting Project Pulp was an “Audio Pulp Fiction Magazine” hosted by Dave Robison and produced by Fred Himebaugh. PPP was originally serialized between 2012 and 2014.

itunes.author: Dave Robison and Fred Himebaugh
